text: awlm yaelam hwla' aladhin kafaruu 'an alsmwat wal'ard kanata mltsqtyn la fasil bynhma, fala mtr min alsama' wala naba'at min alard, ffslnahma bqdrtna, wa'anzalna almatar min alsma', wa'akhrajna alnbat min alard, wajaealna min alma' kula shay' hy, 'afala yumin hwla' aljahdwn fysdqu bima yshahdwnh, wykhssu allah balebad?
